incident.title: [Instana] RobotShop call rate is too high - RobotShop call rate stays at a high level for an extended period of time
incident.description: MySQL Database is unavailable in App.

comments.comment_text: MySQL Deployment was out of Memory. Resolved by increasing memory and restarting mysql pod: oc delete pod -n robot-shop $(oc get po -n orobot-shop|grep mysql|awk '{print$1}')
